author's_name_(_зохиогч): SU MA TI MA nI PRADZNY'A,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BLA MA DANG 'JAM DBYANGS ZUNG 'BREL GYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG CES BYA BA 'DI NI, BLA MA LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA DANG LDAN PA DGE PHYOGS LA BRTZON PA CHE ZHING SEMS 'DUL BA DANG DBANG PO NYE BAR ZHI BA RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN GYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRADZNY'AS DGE LDAN BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN PA 'PHEL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG BA GU SHR'I KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PA DANG, SEMS CAN THAMS CAD RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU THOB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
